item.title: Snapshots from an American Civic Ritual
item.description: The last quarter century of American leadership gathers at the Carter funeral.

item.title: ‘Very Serious Mistake’: GOP Sharply Divided over How to Deliver on Trump Agenda
item.description: Among the pressing questions is whether lawmakers should pursue their priorities in ‘one big beautiful bill’ or separate bills.

item.title: Pay Up, Mr. Mann
item.description: A court in our nation’s capital ordered Mann to pay us $530,820.21 worth of attorney’s fees and costs within 30 days.

item.title: Trump the Expansionist Knows Real Estate Matters
item.description: Geography isn’t everything, but often when it comes to geopolitics, there’s no substitute for cold, hard acreage.

item.title: The Era of Censored Social Media Is Over — for America
item.description: Brussels, meanwhile, retains the progressive faith in managing democratic outcomes by regulating what can and can’t be said.
